content:
# It appears that I encountered an error while trying to insert copper ore into the stone furnace. The error indicates that I do not have any copper ore in my inventory to insert.
# I need to verify my current inventory to confirm the presence of copper ore.

# Let's check the current inventory to see if I still have copper ore.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current inventory: {current_inventory}")

# If I do not have copper ore, I will need to gather more from the environment before proceeding with smelting.
if current_inventory.get(Prototype.CopperOre, 0) == 0:
    print("No copper ore available in inventory. Please gather more copper ore before smelting.")
else:
    # If I do have copper ore, I will attempt to insert it into the furnace again.
    insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=10)

# After confirming the inventory, I will proceed based on the findings.
